Class BoardStateView

java.lang.Object
game.view.BoardStateView
public final class BoardStateView extends Object
A wrapper view for the Board class that exposes state and logic required for the UI, without directly exposing internal AI mechanisms.

This acts as an intermediary or facade, ensuring the UI interacts with the board through a defined interface.

      Checks if the game has ended. * @return true if either player has won

    • redWins

      public boolean redWins()
      Checks if Red has won the game. * @return true if Red connects top and bottom

    • blackWins

      public boolean blackWins()
